role.argrole: thing being passed on generation to generation

example.parse: (IP (PP-PRP (P 由於) (IP (NP-SBJ (NN 族人)) (VP (VP (ADVP (AD 无法)) (VP (VV 确知) (NP-OBJ (DNP (NP (NN 琉璃珠)) (DEG 的)) (NP (NN 由来)) (NP (NN 年代) (CC 与) (NN 地点))))) (PU ，) (VP (ADVP (AD 也)) (ADVP (AD 不)) (VP (VV 知道) (NP-OBJ (DNP (NP (NN 琉璃珠)) (DEG 的)) (ADJP (JJ 传统)) (NP (NN 制作) (NN 技术)))))))) (PU ，) (NP-SBJ (DNP (ADJP (JJ 现存)) (DEG 的)) (NP (NN 琉璃珠))) (VP (VC 为) (IP-PRD (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VP (VV 代代相传)) (VP (MSP 而) (VP (VV 来)))))))
